name: electricity, high voltage, hydro, import from PY | electricity, high voltage | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21811/documentation

This dataset represents the amount of imported electricity from Paraguay to AR. The import value is valid for 2014 and includes all electricity imports, independently whether used within the importing country, or re-exported. ;Half of the electricity production from the binational (Paraguay-Argentina) Yacyretá hydroelectric power plant belongs to  each country. However, as Paraguay's electricity requirements are covered (the country only consumes, on average, between 10 and 13% of the energy produced), the rest of its quota is sold to Argentina, which incorporates it into the national interconnected electrical system.  ;Source: SÍNTESIS DEL MERCADO ELÉCTRICO MAYORISTA DE LA REPÚBLICA ARGENTINA - Diciembre 2014. ;The Argentinean imports from Paraguay aren modelled as " electricity production, hydro, reservoir, tropical region"/ GLO2008 (Access date: January 18, 2018), because this activity does not exist for PY.

This activity represents the point of 'handing over' the electricity from one country to the other at the border

This dataset doesn't include any electricity losses or transmission infrastructure as these are accounted for in the market datasets
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription:
The amount of imported electricity from Paraguay to AR  is obtained from 
CAMMESA "COMPAÑÍA ADMINISTRADORA DEL MERCADO MAYORISTA ELÉCTRICO SOCIEDAD ANÓNIMA" 
Supporting documentation available at: http://portalweb.cammesa.com/Memnet1/default.aspx
The Argentinean imports from Paraguay aren modelled as " electricity production, hydro, reservoir, tropical region, GLO" because this activity does not exist for PY.

exchanges.description: The amount of imported electricity from Paraguay to AR  is supplied from the binational (Paraguay-Argentina) Yacyretá hydroelectric power plant,  as Paraguay only consumes, on average, between 10 and 13% of the energy produced, and  the rest of its quota is sold to Argentina. The Argentinean imports from Paraguay aren modelled as " electricity production, hydro, reservoir, tropical region", GLO2018 (Access date: January 18, 2018), because this activity does not exist for PY.
